name: Hentai Crush - Director's Cut
description:
This is ripped off version of Hentai Crush that excluded adult content, so approprivate for 13+ player or above. But you also can play 18+ content via seperated patch

As a single man who desperately wants to have a girlfriend, you have been introduced to a lot of girls via matchmaking service. Let's seduce them and advance your relationship...Game Features:
  • Lots of animated CG of cute girls
  • Dating simulation elements combined with bubble shooter gameplay
  • Interesting dialogs
  • Lots of item to collect
  • Relaxing and romantic music
  • Cute native Japanese voice
